section.title: List Bills of Operations
section.para: To access the master list of Bills of Operations, select the "List Bills of Operations" option. The following screen will appear:

At the top of the screen is a "Search For" field. To search for an Item, begin typing in the search field. As you type, the "Bills of Operations" list will automatically scroll toward the Item Number you are typing. You can also search for Items manually by using the scroll bar to the right of the "Bills of Operations" list. You may also show Bills of Operations for Inactive Items by selecting that option.

tip.para: You may not delete a Bill of Operations (BOO) if the Item in question has any Revision history. You must make the BOO inactive instead
